definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: corner, of square objects 1Ki 7:34 + v:1Ki 7:30 (rd. [[פִּנּוֹתָיו]] for [[פַּעֲמׂתָיו]], cf. Kit), Ex 27:2, Ex 38:2, Ez Eze 43:19; of house Job 1:19, roof Pr 7:12, Pr 21:9 = Pr 25:24; ´[[אֶבֶן לְפ]] Je 51:26 i.e. a corner-stone; ´[[אֶבֶן פ]] of earth Job 38:9; cf. (fig.) Ps 118:22, and ([[אבן]] om.) Is 28:16; ´[[פ]] = street-corner 2Ch 28:24.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: specif. of wall of Jerus., Ne 3:24 (in SE.), v:Ne 3:31, v:Ne 3:32 (NE.); ´[[שַׁעַד הַפּ]] 2Ki 14:l3 + ‖ 2Ch 25:23 LXX SyrVer Targum and most (for MT [[הַפּוֹנֶה]] ´[[שׁ]]), + (v. [[שַׁעַר]]); appar. with battlements 2Ch 26:15; of cities in gen. [[הַנְּבׂהוֹת]] ´[[הַפּ]] Zep 1:16; of the nations Zep 3:6.
fig. of chief, ruler as corner (support or defence), Ju Jdg 20:2, 1Sa 14:38, Is 19:13 (rd. perhaps pl.); Zec 10:4 (+ [[יׇתֵד]] q.v.).
